memory_mapping.help_text:
Uses the kraken2 memory mapping option. This option avoid loading the whole database into memory, drastically reducing the RAM needed to run the Kraken2 processes, at the expense of a longer runtime.
This option is recommended to shorten turnaround time when submitting large batch runs, where the cumulative effect of many large-memory job submissions will lead to job pending for long times (longer than the time gained running kraken normal/fast way with loading the database in memory.

read_len.help_text: Ideal length of reads in sample

bracken_classification_level.help_text: Taxonomic rank to analyze for Bracken (Options: 'D', 'P', 'C', 'O', 'F', 'G', 'S')

threshold.help_text: Minimum number of reads required for a classification at the specified rank

get_classified_reads.help_text: Flag to determine whether to retrieve classified reads

enable_building.help_text: Include this flag to enable automatic building of kraken2 db if not found on disc
